title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 69.9 - Maintenance of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 69.9 - Maintenance of records

State Regulations
(a) All of the
records hereinabove described shall be maintained on a current basis and all
such transactions must be recorded in the central or main office within five
business days of the date of the actual transaction and must be verifiable by
substantiating documents. (b) All
such records relating to alcoholic beverages must be kept separate and distinct
from any other records maintained by any such licensee. (c) In addition to the records described
herein, such licensee must also maintain in such central or main office any
other records required by law and the rules and regulations of the Liquor

Authority. (d) All such records
must be maintained for a period of at least two years. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
69.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
